title: Probability & Statistics
description: This course is a problem-oriented introduction to the basic concepts of probability and statistics, providing a foundation for applications and further study.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
